name: Sephilath-aider, Shin Malkuth-melekh
effect:
[AUTO]:When revealed for a damage check, if your vanguard is "Arch-aider, Malkuth-melekh", [COST][discard a card from your hand], and ride this card as [Stand].
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have two or more protect markers on your circles, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.
[CONT](VC):All of your units on (RC) with a protect marker cannot be retired by any player's card effects.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Holy Lord Angel
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at seven cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one card with "Malkuth-melekh" in its card name from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, reveal up to one normal unit from your hand, and put it on the top of your deck. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Persistence Angel
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, discard a card from your hand, and put up to one card with "Malkuth-melekh" in its card name from your drop zone on the top of your deck.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Aid-roid, Zayin
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if a new card was put into your opponent's damage zone this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and you may put it into the damage zone. If you do, your opponent heals a card from his or her damage zone, and at the end of that battle, retire this unit.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Bellyful Meds Angel
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], and swap a unit card from your hand with a card in your damage zone. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn. (Put it face up in your damage zone)

name: Healthful Intendant
effect:
[AUTO]:When rode upon, [COST][put this card into your damage zone face down], and call a card from your damage zone to (RC).
[CONT](RC):If a new card was put into your opponent's damage zone this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)

name: Damian the Ghostie
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, search your deck for up to one card with "Ghostie" in its card name, put it into your drop zone, and shuffle your deck.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle it attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Ghostie" in its card name, [COST][retire this unit], and if you did not [Counter-Charge] from the ability of "Damian the Ghostie" this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Dragon Undead, Skull Dragon
effect:
[CONT](Hand):This card cannot be normal called.
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each card in your drop zone.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked, retire this unit.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Greed Shade
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your drop zone has ten or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], put two cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone, and return a card not named "Greed Shade" from your drop zone to your hand.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Ripple Banshee
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from drop zone, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Gust Djinn
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Worm Toxin Mutant, Venom Stinger
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When a card is put into your opponent's damage zone during your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put a rear-guard into your soul], until end of that battle, even if a trigger unit is revealed for your opponent's damage check, that trigger effect does not activate, and you perform the same trigger effect as that card's trigger effect. Then, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 grade 3], choose up to two cards from your opponent's damage zone, put them into his or her drop zone, and deal one damage to your opponent's vanguard for each card put into his or her drop zone.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Pincer Attack Mutant, Intrude Scissors
effect:
[AUTO](Drop zone):At the end of the battle your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacked, if a new card was put into your opponent's damage zone this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and call this card to (RC).
[AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Mutant Gentleman, High Class Moth
effect:
[CONT]Deck/Soul:It is regarded as grade 3.
[ACT](RC):[COST][[Rest] this unit & Put a normal unit from your drop zone on the bottom of your deck], [Counter-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and that unit cannot intercept until end of turn. This ability may only be used by a card with the same card name once a turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Machining Mantis
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at six cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 card from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and this unit gets [Power] +6000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Small Captain, Butterfly Officer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][[Rest] this unit], choose up to one of your other rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +10000. If you chose, at the end of that turn, put that unit into your soul, and [Counter-Charge 1].
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Stealth Millipede
effect:
[CONT](RC):If this unit is [Rest], all of your opponent's rear-guards in the same column as this unit cannot [Stand].
[AUTO](RC):When its attack or the attack it boosted hits, put this unit into your soul, and [Counter-Charge 1]. (This effect is mandatory)
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Maiden of Stand Peony
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, call up to one Plant token to (RC). If this unit is on (VC), call up to two Plant tokens instead of one. (Plant tokens are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire four rear-guards], call four Plant tokens to your (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit and all of your token units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Maiden of Fall Vine
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed from hand on a (RC) with a Plant token, draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Maiden of Flower Carpet
effect:

name: Autumn's Turning Maiden, Rosie

name: Maiden of Nepenthes
effect:

[AUTO](RC):When it boosts a grade 3 rear-guard, you may have the boosted unit get [Critical] +1 until end of that battle. If you do, at the end of that battle, put this unit into your soul.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Fruits Basket Elf
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire this unit], call up to two Plant tokens to (RC), and if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those Plant tokens get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Plants are grade 0/[Power] 5000/[Critical] 1 and have boost)

name: Chronojet Dragon
effect:
[ACT](VC):[COST][Discard one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand], search your deck for up to one grade 4 card, ride it as [Stand], and shuffle your deck. At the end of the turn, retire that unit, and ride a grade 3 card from your soul as [Rest].
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and your opponent cannot call sentinels from his or her hand.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Sephilath-aider, Shin Malkuth-melekh
effect:
[AUTO]:When revealed for a damage check, if your vanguard is "Arch-aider, Malkuth-melekh", [COST][discard a card from your hand], and ride this card as [Stand].
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have two or more protect markers on your circles, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.
[CONT](VC):All of your units on (RC) with a protect marker cannot be retired by any player's card effects.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Mesmerizing Witch, Fianna
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire two rear-guards], search your hand or deck for up to one "Witch of Reality, Femme", call it to a front row (RC), and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. The circle that called unit is on becomes a (VC) until end of turn.
[CONT](VC):During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +5000 for each of your opponent's grade 0 rear-guards.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Spectral Duke Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC):If you have a "Black Dragon Knight, Vortimer" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +1000, and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & retire three rear-guards], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn. If your damage zone has four or more cards, it gets drive +1 instead of drive -1.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Light Battle Dragon, Gigannoblazer
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if three or more new equip gauges were put for your units this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 &[Soul-Blast 1], draw two cards, and call two cards from your hand to (RC). Put up to one card from the top of your deck face down as an equip gauge for each of those units. (Put without looking at the front of those cards)
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Six Flowers of Phantasms, Shirayuki
effect:
[CONT]Deck/Drop zone:This card is also regarded as "Fantasy Petal Storm, Shirayuki".
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's front row units, and it gets [Power] -30000 until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC/RC)[1/turn]:When your unit's attack does not hit, if you have a vanguard with "Shirayuki" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row units, and it gets [Power] -10000 until end of turn. If this unit is on (VC), you may call a card with "Shirayuki" in its card name from your drop zone to an open (RC).
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Dragonic Kaiser Vermillion "THE BLOOD"
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card from your hand into your soul], and until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000/drive +1, and when it would attack, it battles all of your opponent's front row units. If you put a "Dragonic Kaiser Vermilion" into your soul for this cost, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1.
[ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 card with "Kaiser" in its card name], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of turn. At the end of that turn, deal this unit one damage.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Star-vader, Chaos Breaker Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your opponent has a locked card, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], your opponent gets an Imaginary Gift:Force, you choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and lock it.
[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's locked card is unlocked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], retire one of those unlocked units, you draw a card, your opponent removes a total of two markers from his or her circles or Protect from his or her hand, and you get an Imaginary Gift:Force for each marker or Protect removed.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Evil God Bishop, Gastille
effect:
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your battle phase, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, and your opponent chooses one of the following effects for every five cards in your soul. You perform the chosen effects in any order. (Each effect can only be chosen once)
・All of your front row units get [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
・Your opponent's vanguard's [Power] increases or decreases to 1 until end of turn.
・All of your opponent's [AUTO] abilities do not activate until end of turn.
・Your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and puts it into his or her damage zone face down.
productName: [VGE-V-SS07] Special Series 07 Clan Selection Plus Vol.1

name: Interdimensional Dragon, Time Leaper Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][put a rear-guard on the bottom of your deck], search your deck for up to one card with grade equal to the card put on the bottom of your deck for this cost's grade +1, call it to (RC), shuffle your deck, and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
